 2012-02632012-03-08,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectKimberley Campbell and Betty Gray Tax Remission Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER which remits goods and services tax (GST) in respect of the net tax paid by KIMBERLEY CAMPBELL and BETTY GRAY under Part IX of the Excise Tax Act when no tax was collectible.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2012-0010 Publication Date: 2012-03-28
